ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes
des: "This is a great soup that just gets better overnight, and is a family favorite.  Cook time can be shortened by using a pressure cooker to cook the beans.  Canned beans just do not give the best flavor, so I would not recommend them.  Each person adds the amount of sour cream to their bowl that suits their own taste.  It is wonderful served with a crusty bread."
ins:
Wash and pick through beans.  Place them in a large pot with the water.  Season with salt and pepper.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, 1 1/2 to 2 hours, until just tender.
Stir in undrained corn and tomatoes, potatoes and cabbage.  Simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.  At the table, stir sour cream to taste into individual servings.
